description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5f2qn","text":"Uploading data to Terra.bio is an essential step in the protocol for analyzing locally stored genomic sequencing data. The Terra.bio uploads page allows users to easily organize their data files using an associated metadata file via a browser-based graphical user interface. This protocol explains the process to prepare the data files and the associated metadata file for upload, and provides the link to the Terra.bio uploads page.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frg08","text":"Select an existing workspace or create the workspace where the data will be uploaded. If there are no workspaces created under the billing project associated with this account please reach out to support@theiagen.com and we will facilitate the creation of a workspace pre-loaded with workflows to perform the analyses needed to meet any variety of research objectives.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmf7o","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nc2k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D85E0C702AA711EC9F1259919F9E773E","height":93,"id":187258,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy56bmdfx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy54bmdfx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy55bmdfx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy53bmdfx.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as6i4","text":"Select an existing collection or create the collection where the data will be uploaded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eup1d","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8mmoa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4E6978502AA811EC9F1259919F9E773E","height":114,"id":187262,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6abmdfx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy58bmdfx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy59bmdfx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy57bmdfx.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2th0q","text":"Drag and drop files into the indicated region of the page (or use the file browser by selecting the plus button in the bottom right hand of the window).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fvi0","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctg78","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"0DA2DEA02AA911EC9F1259919F9E773E","height":176,"id":187266,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"206fr","text":"Then click 'NEXT'","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6ebmdfx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6cbmdfx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6dbmdfx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6bbmdfx.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu9ie","text":"Using the sample names and file names of the the files that have been uploaded to Terra, create a spreadsheet of this \"metadata\" to upload to Terra as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rp4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et3kl","text":"Cell A1 defines the root entity. This will be the name of the table where the data is stored in Terra. The root entity is defined using the \"entity:\" notation and must end with \"_id\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":141,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":178,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eit8n","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"unrv","text":" *NOTE: It is best practices to include the run_id of each sample in an addition column:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4009e","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e1dad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BF98BE502AAD11EC9F1259919F9E773E","height":290,"id":187270,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1866k","text":"The file names in the spreadsheet should match the file names of the files that were uploaded in the previous section.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6ibmdfx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6gbmdfx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6hbmdfx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6fbmdfx.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A274F8C04BC811EC96B3BB7BFF695E99","height":271,"id":187274,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6nbmdfx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6kbmdfx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6mbmdfx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fy6jbmdfx.webp","width":550}}}}
